attributes.action: Casino to refund 80% from their customers losses during the coronavirus lockdown
attributes.additional_details: UK was among the top 10 countries for paid gambling ads online last month, having recorded 112,818 between 5 April and 4 May – up 196% year on year.Basically this Companies found this period very profitable. People who gamble regularly online are doing so just as often or more frequently during the coronavirus lockdown.During this uncertain period the goverment did a great job protecting and supporting people around the UK.This can be a unic chance for the Casinos to prove suport regarding their customers
attributes.background: The Government can discuss with the Gambling Commission and they can ask to the online casinos to refund 80% from the loses to all customers form 23 March 2020 until 1 June 2020

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for transactions between casinos and their customers. This is matter for individual casinos and their customers.

We have published petitions calling for casinos and online gambling to be cancelled, which you might like to sign:

Ban online gambling immediately in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309612

Ban all gambling premises after Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312717
